item.title: Uber is close to completing its quest to become the ultimate robotaxi app
item.description: Uber just announced a deal today with the company that runs one of the largest robotaxi fleets in China, as the ridehail giant nears its goal of becoming the world’s ultimate autonomous vehicle cleari
